errors.noAdminPrivileges: You do not have admin privileges.
errors.notInNetwork: You are not part of any network.

welcome.title: Welcome to {{networkName}}!
welcome.description: Welcome to {{networkName}}! Let's set up your profile.
welcome.subtitle: You've been invited to join this private network. Before you can access the full experience, we need you to complete your profile.
welcome.setupProfile: Set up your basic profile information
welcome.timeEstimate: This will only take a few minutes

basicInfo.fullNameHelper: How you'll appear to other members
basicInfo.contactEmailHelper: This will be visible to other network members
basicInfo.taglineHelper: {{count}}/60 - A short phrase that represents you (optional)

profilePicture.description: Add a photo to help others recognize you
profilePicture.dragDrop: Drag & drop an image or click the edit icon
profilePicture.infoMessage: Adding a profile picture helps other members recognize and connect with you

professionalDetails.description: Share your skills and professional links
professionalDetails.skillsHelper: Enter your skills and press Enter (optional)
professionalDetails.infoMessage: These professional details help other members understand your expertise and interests

introPost.description: Share an introduction post with the community
introPost.wouldYouLike: Would you like to introduce yourself to the {{networkName}} community with your first post?
introPost.skipForNow: Skip for now - I'll introduce myself later
introPost.yesCreate: Yes, I'd like to create an introduction post
introPost.postTitlePlaceholder: Hello everyone! Let me introduce myself...
introPost.postContentPlaceholder: Share your background, interests, what you're looking forward to in this community...
introPost.successMessage: Your introduction post will be published after you complete your profile setup.
introPost.postWillBePublished: This post will be published when you complete setup

review.successMessage: Great! Your profile is ready. Review your information before joining {{networkName}}.

success.title: Profile Completed!
success.message: Welcome to {{networkName}}! You're all set to start exploring and connecting.

errors.sessionError: Session error. Please try logging in again.
errors.updateError: An error occurred while updating your profile

basics.description: Let's start by creating your network. What would you like to call it?
basics.networkNameHelper: Choose a name for your network

privacy.description: Configure how members will join and what they can see
privacy.title: Network Privacy
privacy.privateDesc: Only invited members can join and view content
privacy.restrictedDesc: Members need approval, but non-members can see basic info
privacy.publicDesc: Anyone can join and view content
privacy.changeInfo: You can always change these settings later from the Admin Panel.

features.description: Select which features you'd like to enable for your network:
features.eventsDesc: Create and manage events for your network
features.filesDesc: Share files and documents with your members
features.changeInfo: You can enable or disable features later from the Admin Panel.

branding.description: Configure your network logo, theme, and navigation

logo.title: Network Logo
logo.description: Upload a logo for your network. This will appear in the header and represent your network.

error.invalidType: Please upload a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP)
error.tooLarge: Image size must be less than 2MB
error.failed: Failed to upload logo. Please try again.

navigation.title: Navigation Tabs
navigation.description: Select which tabs will appear in your network navigation. Drag to reorder them.

background.title: Landing Page Background Image
background.description: Upload a background image for your network's landing page. This creates a more immersive welcome experience.
background.defaultGradient: A default gradient will be used
background.recommendation: Recommended size: 1920x1080 pixels (16:9 ratio). Max file size: 10MB. For best results, use an image with good contrast for text visibility.

error.invalidType: Please upload a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP)
error.tooLarge: Background image size must be less than 10MB
error.failed: Failed to upload background image. Please try again.

review.description: Review your settings and create your network
review.infoMessage: Please review your network settings before creating. You can modify all these settings later from the admin panel.

success.title: Network Created Successfully!
success.message: Your network "{{networkName}}" has been created. You can now start inviting members and customizing your space.

errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create a network
errors.createError: An error occurred while creating your network

page.title: Set Up Your Network
page.welcome: Welcome, {{name}}! Let's configure your new community space.
page.description: This wizard will guide you through creating and customizing your network. You can change any of these settings later through the admin panel.
page.errorLoadingProfile: Failed to load profile information. Please try again.
page.loginRequired: Please log in to create a network.
page.questionsHelp: Still have questions? Refer to our documentation for more detailed information about setting up your network.
